channel.title: Corrupted-souls. Looking for developers
channel.description:
:D :DWelcome to Corrupted-souls development team. :D :D
[url=http://www.corrupted-souls.com]www.corrupted-souls.com[/url]
Great 317 loading 500+ Eco server, we currently are holding 100 registered accounts, i would say 70 are legit, about about 25-30 of them are constant players daily. we are hosting of a vps, we have a website+Domain.
Current staff team-
Daniel- Owner (Developer) Zach- Co-Owner (developer) Aj- (Forums developer)
We are looking for another 1-2 people to help us on development. You will be doing alot of work to the client before starting on the source, as me and zach are working alot on the source and have not enough time to be working of the client.
If your a forums developer please apply to, we would like and extra person on forums helping out :) but please be aware we use (SMF)
We would like you to have some experience in java, and need to be able to work with us atleast 1-2 hours a day. you may apply on this thread or pm me, also add me on skype and talk to me on there.
Skype- "mother-bitch-mah-dick" yes i no, i made it when i was 12 :-D
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/6h51k8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/hv3p0h.jpg[/img]
Active forums, donate page is still being worked on same with voting system.
Donator area - being worked on for some awsome features. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/29m8u8k.jpg[/img]
Complete Undergoing construction
Misc. Dicing Donator Super Donator Extreme donor Trusted Dicer Loyalty titles
Mini-Games. Dungeoneering - we are thinking of changing though, to a new place with different features. Barrows Duel Arena Castle wars Souls wars
Bosses. Ice Strykyrm King Black Dragon Dagg Kings Bork Godwars Tormented Demons Nomad [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/264qjgm.png[/img]
Monster Training.
Rock Crabs Taverly Dungeon - we are currently fixing the mapdata as it is glitchy. Slayer Tower Brim Haven Hill Giants [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/23hxelk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/14vh5r5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/wi7ggx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qm13cl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/143m4c4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/33nx02h.jpg[/img]
Pk Spots. Mage's Bank Edgville West Dragons East Dragons [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/160cw8l.jpg[/img]
Skills. Combat Attack Strength Defence Constitution Range Mage Prayer
Skilling. Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Woodcutting Firemaking Farming - yet we are working on making a new flawless farming area. Thieving Herblore Runecrafting - another skill we would like to move and fix up. Slayer Hunter Summoning Construction
Come visit our Community :cool:

item.title: Corrupted-souls. Looking for developers
item.dc:creator: @owner5 owner5
item.description:
@owner5 wrote:

I took off all of the other pages because the server shut down and i did not need them. I rarely ever use Moparscape unless i am looking for a job. I dont use sites like these because they are mainly for Server Development and not Website Development. However i would use them to read about PI server development because i am interested in them and i like to mess around in a source i have.

Read full topic

item.title: Corrupted-souls. Looking for developers
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

tell how this works please, u joined over 5 years ago yet only posted 15 times…?? how??

Read full topic

item.title: Corrupted-souls. Looking for developers
item.dc:creator: @owner5 owner5
item.description:
@owner5 wrote:

I am looking for a position in Website Development but i have some experience in forums as well. I will use this resume since i could not find one in your post.

Can you write Html/Php:I can code HTML well and i know JavaScript well
Do you have much website knowledge:I’d say yes i go to a vocational highchool where i take 2 hours of Computer Science every day.
Position: Head Website developer, website dev, Administrator, Forums manager
Experience (Scale 1-10):9
Age:17
Time you will use a day on the server:3-4 hrs
Previous Work:CO-Owner of Deadlyscape. Admin/Website Creator of http://Sabatinoscape.tk/ (Server has shut down so i kept the home page only.
Skype:om4r321

Read full topic

item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

thanks a lot for the likes, hope to get a lot bigger in the forth coming days, i believe we are gaining more people everyday now? hope to see at least 50 players end of this month would really be great.

item.dc:creator: @andrew_weir andrew weir
item.description:
@andrew_weir wrote:

Great server i can see the guys the guys put alot of work into the server. very good community . great loyal staff always avaible when needed. everything works perfectly no lag or bugs . if your looking for a server to go i sincerly recomend here

***** 5 starss
